title: Teva CEO on Staying Competitive in Generic Drug Market
itunes:title: Teva CEO on Staying Competitive in Generic Drug Market
description:
Kåre Schultz, CEO at Teva Pharmaceutical, talks about the company's restructuring plans as well as his outlook for drug development. He says more than 90% of U.S. pharmaceuticals are generics and one out of ten drugs is produced by Teva.

Host: Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
